dashboard.hust: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
dashboard.description: BK-AUTO Club was established in 2010 with the purpose of creating a scientific research playground for students of Hanoi University of Science and Technology in general and students of the Automotive and Specialized Vehicle Department of the Faculty of Mechanical Engineering in particular...

intro.subtitle: INTRODUCTION
intro.title: BK-AUTO Club
intro.description1: BK-AUTO Club was established in 2010 with the purpose of creating a scientific research playground for students of Hanoi University of Science and Technology in general and students of the Automotive and Specialized Vehicle Department of the Faculty of Mechanical Engineering in particular.
intro.description2: Formerly known as the Eco-Car Club - fuel economy with the tradition of participating in Honda's Eco-Driving competition, by 2021, BK-AUTO has expanded its scope of research, learning, and development to many different areas such as: electric vehicle simulation, electronic system design on cars, IT applications in cars... to participate in student scientific research competitions inside and outside the school such as: Polytechnic Youth Creativity, Student Scientific Research Month, EMC Honda, ...
intro.description2-short: Formerly known as the Eco-Car Club - fuel economy with a tradition of participating in Honda's Eco-Driving competition,...

contact.subtitle: We are ready to help you answer any questions!
contact.title: Enter contact information
contact.name: Full name
contact.enterMessage: Describe more clearly the issue you are interested in

target.title: Target Audience:
target.description: All students from HUST and other universities with passion for learning, exchanging knowledge and researching in automotive field.

notes.title: IMPORTANT NOTES
notes.note1: Each applicant can only submit the form once. Please check your answers carefully before submitting.
notes.note2: Interview time, location and results will be notified via email.
notes.note3: If you have scheduling conflicts on interview day, please message BK-AUTO Fanpage or email support{'@'}bkauto.vn immediately

form.title: Member Registration Form
form.schoolPlaceholder: Example: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
form.subDepartmentNote: Skill departments help you develop complementary skills for your main expertise
form.cvUploadNote: You can upload your CV to Google Drive, OneDrive or other platforms and paste the link here
form.questions: Do you have any questions or comments for the Club?
form.questionsPlaceholder: e.g., I'd like to know more about club activities, study schedule,...
form.questionsNote: This section is optional. You can leave it blank if you don't have any questions.
form.submitError: An error occurred while submitting. Please try again later.
form.validationError: Please check and fill in all required information

draft.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all entered information? This action cannot be undone.

validation.fullNameMin: Full name must be at least 2 characters
validation.mssvRange: Student ID must be between 20210000 and 20250000
validation.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted an application. Each device is only allowed to submit one application.

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.message: Thank you for applying to join BK-AUTO Club
success.description: We will contact you via email before 12:00 PM October 3, 2025. Or you can follow the information on the Club's Fanpage!
success.alreadySubmitted: You have successfully submitted your application!
success.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the submission status? This will allow submitting a new application from this device.
success.resetSuccess: Reset successfully. You can submit a new application.
